CustomField.description: If ticked, Challenge can grant Challenge Rewards while being "Active". It can only be applied to Challenges under "Singular", "Time Table" or "Level Table" types. For "Position Range", "Value Range" or "Mission Table" types, Challenge Rewards are granted when Challenge status is "Completed" (i.e. it meets its "Final Date").
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If ticked, Challenge can grant Challenge Rewards while being "Active". It can only be applied to Challenges under "Singular", "Time Table" or "Level Table" types.
CustomField.label: Challenge Reward Delivery
